text:
Hi there, we, Society for Data Science, BIT Mesra is organizing a two-days summit called 'Data Science Summit'21' from 20 Feb - 21st Feb. So we are looking for a Julia speaker where he/she can give a 30min - 60min lecture. We will be very happy to have you on board. I tried but right now I am not that much comfortable. To know more about us:
<https://sdsbitmesra.in>
To know about Data Science Summit:
<https://datathon.sdsbitmesra.in/>

attachments.title: SDS | Society for Data Science
attachments.text: Society for Data Science is BIT Mesra's first student-run, not-for-profit organization focused on data science and its interdisciplinary applications.
